name: WAREHOUSE BITCHES
description:
The Time Worm arrived as it was prophesied just as the crown fell upon his head, and all potentials collapsed into a single haunted citadel, which you call Hex City. You are transgender punks and goths from earth, and in this place your powerful hearts make you witches, daemons, beast-people and arcane architects. We bide our time, smoking and drinking, playing video games and eyeing the crumbling walls of our enemy, The Lord of Olympus.

In Warehouse Bitches, you play as one of the titular warehouse-dwelling trans folk in the hellish Hex City. In this GMless Belonging Outside Belonging game with a unique coin-flip mechanic, you'll wield magic, build allies across the city and fight back against the bastards in subtle ways.

Pick from one of four Playbooks - Godtwin, Startracer, Nothing Messiah and Autoclave Lure - and convince the time worm... or seek the heart of the city far below, and hold onto this moment forever.

CREDITS:

  • I, Darling Demon Eclipse, made this.
    • You can find me at twitch.tv/darlingdemoneclipse, twitter.com/ddemoneclipse and darlingdemoneclipse.itch.io
  • Based on the Belonging Outside Belonging engine by Buried Without Ceremony.
  • I love my girlfriend! @mom__bun on Twitter.
  • Inspired by HEXCRAFT: Harlequin Fair by Oleander Garden.
  • Trans Fucking Rage Jam! Lead by @stargazersasha on Twitter. This game was made for that jam initially, and uses its color scheme.
    • Also, all of Sasha’s weekly jams, which this game is part of in often asynchronous and asymmetrical ways.
